name: Two Chars: ONE 'a' + NOT 'a'
content:
a{1}[^a]
a aa aaaaaaa aab  a b ba bababaabbbaabababaaabbaba

~{1}[^~]
~ ~~~~~~

abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
